page.title: 10FINZEAN COMMUNITY CLUB.
page.content: {Finzean Youth and Community Club}has been functioning for 20 years,starting as a community club for adult members in 1965 but gradually changing to include younger people from 12 years upwards.Membership numbers are 30-40. The Club meets every Monday evening in Finzean Hall during March-October, members participating in{Badminton, {Table Tennis and Pool. There is a Deeside Badminton League consisting of 8 Clubs:Banchory East, Durris,Drumoak,Ballater,Aboyne Tarland and Finzean in which we compete quite successfully. Junior members compete in an annual Youth Club Jamboree at the Aboyne Community Centre,winning the {Championship Shield}in 1984. The Club is financed by fund-raising and local Government grant.
